Kirkland.Downtown Bellevue: Downtown Bellevue is the central business district of Bellevue, Washington. It comprises 400 acres bounded by I-405 to the east, NE 12th Street to the north, 100th Ave NE to the west, and Main Street to the south. It is currently the second largest city center in Washington with more than 50,000 employees and 12,000 residents.
